I usually wear a large top and medium bottom. I ordered a large, figuring that a larger bottom would be perfectly fine - and it was. The bottoms are also very flattering, as I’ve had multiple lower abdominal surgeries that left my lower left half much larger than my right. I also have very wide hips, and the bottoms do not dig in at all! My only complaint with the bottoms is the buttons are extremely loose, and feel like they’re barely hanging on, right out of the package. The top, however, runs incredibly small. I wear a 36D, and my chest was BULGING out of the tiny cups (they’re definitely demi cups, and smaller than pictured) and the band was tighter than I’d like, but still manageable, as this is a bathing suit meant for home use. The band clasp seems a little flimsy, as well, and the halter tie is extremely long.  I will be keeping it, as the bottoms would be too big, but it would probably be wiser to just order separate tops and bottoms to get the correct sizing!
Smaller than expected usually wear between a large and XL and definitely needed a xxl for bottoms

This brand is weird.  In another suit they have, I started with a size large, then got an XL, then an XXL, then an XXXL, and had to keep the XXXL, which is weird since I'm not an XXXL person.  I usually wear medium.  5'7" and 130 pounds.  So when I got this one I decided to start with an XXL, then an XL, then an L, and finally kept the medium.  So in this one brand I now have two suits, one that's a medium and one that's an XXXL.  Order a few sizes, and return what doesn't work.

I'm out almost $30 and just shocked at how poorly this adorable suit fit.

I am a 45 year old, 5'11", 160 lb woman who struggles with getting into a bathing suit.  I HATE to have to wear a suit, but we were heading to Las Vegas, and I needed a suit.  Let me just say, I've worn tankini's for the last several years to try and camouflage my problem areas.  I had it all wrong!  This high, bottom is exactly what I needed! It hides my saggy lower belly (3-10 pound babies will leave a mark on ya) and slims me in the middle, that red sash really does the trick to look like it's pulling my middle in.  The top is super flattering.  I've never felt so comfortable in a swim suit in my entire life.  This would be so cute on many different types of figures.  Well worth the money paid for it.  I want one in every color!
So cute & comfortable.
Fits in all the right areas and curve… it’s a little tight under the boob and my butt cheeks get a tight squeeze but it still looks good, my butts just a little bigger for my height

This swimsuit literally covered the flaws, or I would not say flaws, the momma tracks I have gained from my miracle. I'm 5'4" 145lbs & 36D...I ordered a large but apparently I'd be a medium in bottoms & an extra large in tops with this brand since the bottom was a bit too big but the top was WAY too small. Unfortunately ordering the pieces separately isn't an option or I would because the suit is adorable.

评论详情: Fit really well! I'd say the size chart is accurate. Although the buttons are silver with anchors on them, not the gold ones shown in the seller's pictures. They were loosely sewed on, so I re-sewed them and they look great.

This swim suit is super cute and I got it because of the pin-up nostalgia. But let me be straight with you, it made me look like my butt fell off, and not even being conceited I have a great ass from what I've been told. But this swimsuit was unflattering in the back. From the front it was pretty cute. The bottoms were a little tight at the waistline and I think I heard the elastic rip a little bit when I put it on, but no real visible damage to the bottoms. The top was a little tight but nothing uncomfortable or unbearable, I wore it to a pool party for like 5 or 6 hours. But the back made me look awful, and I usually get great compliments on my back end. This is totally cute from the front but it makes your nice butt completely disappear.

I will definitely be returning this. I ordered a medium & although the top is true to size, I received bottoms that have to for on XS or Small (labeled as medium). It’s actually somewhat comical how tiny these bottoms are that COMPLETELY LACK STRETCH like a normal swimsuit.

评论概述: Super cute, but not adjustable, and the buttons will fall off
评论详情: This bathing Is ADORABLE!!!! I love it so much that I was willing to put in the EFFORT to make it work. My problem with it is the top is not adjustable, you get one loop, and better hope that you are the right size for it. My boobs are smaller than my around size, so either I am stuck with something that is too big in the cup and doesn't cut into me, or something that fits my boobs but cuts off circulation. So I opted for the too big in the cup and just sewed it a little tighter to hold things up better. Also don't get to attached to the buttons if you don't know how to sew a simple loop to secure them, because those babies are gone.
